pages.title: information
pages.text: What's That Slot? is a mod that shows what items can go in a slot. Useful when you dont know what a slot does or youre looking for items to put in a slot.$(br2)To use, press $(k:Check Slot) whilst hovering over a lot to bring up the 'What's That Slot?' list which contains every possible item that can go in that slot.$(br2)The keybind can be changed in controls.
